channel.title: Hosting on WRISH
channel.description: Recent content in Hosting on WRISH

item.title: Hosting for free with GitHub Pages using Windows (with custom domain)
item.description: I am unashamedly cheap. Here is how to host your personal website for no cost on github pages running on a windows platform. Install a GIT client There are lots - I chose the one that came up first in a Google search and haven’t tried any others. Download Git For Windows Run Git-2.xx.x-64-bit.exe that you just downloaded and install setting the following options Use Git from the Windows Command Prompt (default) Checkout as-is, commit as-is (not default) Everything else default Choosing the second item just means you will see less verbose output if you are using a Windows only environment.
